metadata.title: CVE-2020-36423 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Arm Mbed TLS before 2.23.0. A remote attacker can recover plaintext because a certain Lucky 13 countermeasure doesn't properly consider the case of a hardware accelerator.

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
